title: False banned / RIOT BAN ABUSE
body: I criticized my players, told my team to "stop inting' - riot employees responds "That's is flaming"

replies.body:
that is flaming tho.

telling your teammate to improve and telling them to stop inting is different.

Telling someone:
"hey thresh, can you throw your lantern at me when we engage? it will make our fights faster" 
is telling them to improve with a tip, but
"dumbass lol play better" is straight flame.

"Can you please stop dying for no reason"
or
"Stop inting"
:)
Post the logs or a screenshot this doesn’t seem accurate.
if it isnt constructive and only ment to be insulting *gasp* its probably flaming, also you got banned for more than that post your chat logs

That's not the entire story.. had this often enough here.
I legit told my 10 deaths Urgot in aram to play safe, then he proceeded to snowball into 5 people another 10 times and answered "no, reported"
Wonder oh wonder I didn't get a punishment.
So stop pretending
Somehow I feel you said alot more
